#summary Compiling SilverTree on Windows with MinGW.

= Dependencies =

 * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/mingw/MinGW-5.1.3.exe Minimalist GNU for Windows].
 * [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.5.1/python-2.5.1.msi Python](needed by SCons).
 * [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/scons/scons-0.97.win32.exe?modtime=1179416442&big_mirror=0  SCons].
 * [http://trolltech.com/developer/downloads/qt/windows Qt4](needed by SilverTree editor).

These are provided by [http://files.openomy.com/public/loonycyborg/silvertree_SDK-r1.zip SilverTree SDK]:

 * SDL
 * SDL_image
 * SDL_ttf
 * boost regex

= Compiling SilverTree =

 * Install MinGW; add C:\path\to\mingw\bin to _PATH_ environment variable
 * Install Python
 * Install SCons
 * Check out a working copy as detailed [http://code.google.com/p/silvertree/source elsewhere].
 * Unpack SilverTree SDK into working copy root.
 * Run command prompt, cd to working copy root and run _scons_.

== Compiling SilverTree editor ==
 * Install Qt.
 * run _scons QT4DIR=C:\path\to\qt editor_.
